multiple choice.question: In a window, at the top is the _____, immediately below it is the _____.
The _____ are a collection of shortcut icons for commonly used functions.
_____ is not a web page editor.
Which instructs a Web browser on how to format and process a hypertext document?
Web page editors are _____ application packages.
With the help of a word processor we can save our work as
Name the element content to be manipulated by the tags.
choices: (A) Text between the start tag and end tag
multiple choice.answer: (A) Text between the start tag and end tag

multiple choice.question: How many font sizes are permitted by HTML to display text?
Which of the following specifies the space between the border of the cell and its contents?
_____ are like the drop down lists used in windows dialog boxes.
How many types of heading does an HTML contain?
Which HTML tag is used to display the data in the tabular form?
Hyperlinks in HTML have meanings on their colors, what does a link that is colored purple mean?
What does <th> mean or do?
What is the use of an iframe tag?
choices: (A) An iframe is used by apple applications.
(B) An iframe is used to display a web page within a web page.
(C) An iframe is used to display apple websites.
(D) An iframe is used to display a web page for IOS users.
multiple choice.answer: (B) An iframe is used to display a web page within a web page.

multiple choice.question: Every HTML document should have what?
choices: (A) A head section, and within it a title, followed by a body.
(B) A title section, and within it a header, followed by a body.
multiple choice.answer: (A) A head section, and within it a title, followed by a body.

multiple choice.question: Which tag would insert a graphic into a Web page?
What allows you to transfer your html files to a Web server?
choices: (A) FTP which stands for File Tracking Performance
(B) FTP which stands for File Transfer Protocol
(C) BMR which stands for Binary Metric Rhythm
multiple choice.answer: (B) FTP which stands for File Transfer Protocol

multiple choice.question: What will happen if you overlap sets of tags?
choices: (B) the first tag will be used.
(C) the second tag will be used.
multiple choice.answer: (B) the first tag will be used.

multiple choice.question: Which browsers support HTML 5?
